get.description: Use this method to get all categories with metadata. - Supports pagination via page parameter. Default 50 categories per page. - Not providing page will return categories for page 1.
Use this method to get all parent categories and all their children. - Supports pagination via page parameter. 200 response items per page. - Not providing page will return items for page 1.

Use this method to find a single category. If the category is a parent at the root, all the children is returned.
            If the category is a parent as well as a child to another category, parent of the search category is not returned.

Use this method to get all the category reference codes. - Supports pagination via page parameter. 200 response items per page. - Not providing page will return items for page 1. Reference codes are convenient way of storing the reference of an entity from an another system that is related to an EposNow entity. Reference code methods always deal with the Reference codes registered with the authorizing token.
Use this method to get a category reference code.

get.summary: Get a CategoryReferenceCode by category id
get.description: Use this method to get a category reference code by Category id.
Use this method to get all the Container Fee List

get.summary: Get a Container Fee Details by Id

get.description: Use this method to get all container fees. - Supports pagination via page parameter. Default 50 container fees per page. - Not providing page will return container fees for page 1.
Use this method to get all the price bands

get.summary: Get all Price Schedules for the given location
get.description: Use this method to get all the price schedules for the given location
Use this method to get all products. - Supports pagination via page parameter. 200 response items per page. - Not providing page will return items for page 1.

Use this method to get all products that are marked SellOnWeb = true or they have a ProductReferenceCode set for your app. This will make it possible to resolve which products have been extrenally synced already and any those that have since been set to SellOnWeb = false. - Supports pagination via page parameter. 200 response items per page. - Not providing page will return items for page 1.

Use this method to get all products that are marked SellOnWeb = true or they have a ProductReferenceCode set for your app. This will make it possible to resolve which products have been extrenally synced already and any those that have since been set to SellOnWeb = false. - Supports pagination via page parameter. 200 response items per page. - Not providing page will return items for page 1.

get.summary: Get cost price for transaction item by product id
Get Products by reference code list.
Get Customer Specific Pricing By ProductId
Get all unavailable products for the current Till
get.description: Use this method to get all unavailable products for the location stored on the user context.

get.summary: Get the product availability information for the current Till
get.description: Returns the availability status for that product in the current location.

get.summary: Get all unavailable products for a location
get.description: Use this method to get all unavailable products for the location stored on the user context.

get.summary: Get the product availability information for a location
get.description: Returns the availability status for that product in the current location.
Include/excluded deleted products with showDeleted=true/false.

get.summary: Get all ProductCompositions for a product.
get.description: Include/excluded deleted products with showDeleted=true/false.
Use this method to get all product groups.
Use this method to get all the Products Images.

get.summary: Get Product Images by product id
get.description: Use this method to find images for a single product.

Use this method to get all the product reference codes. - Supports pagination via page parameter. 200 response items per page. - Not providing page will return items for page 1. Reference codes are convenient way of storing the reference of an entity from an another system that is related to an EposNow entity. Reference code methods always deal with the Reference codes registered with the authorizing token.
Use this method to get a product reference code.

get.summary: Get a ProductReferenceCode by product id
get.description: Use this method to get a product reference code by product id.

Use this method to get all products with metadata. - Supports pagination via page parameter. Default 50 products per page. - Not providing page will return products for page 1. - Not providing archived will return non archived products. - Providing archived with value 'true' will return only archived products.

VariantMaps are used as part of variant products. Use this method to get all VariantMaps. - Supports pagination via page parameter. 200 response items per page. - Not providing page will return items for page 1.
VariantMaps are used as part of variant products. Use this method to find a single VariantMap.

Basic.description:
The Epos Now API uses Location specific API keys to authenticate requests. You can view and manage your API keys from the Epos Now Back Office under the API Device located in the App Store.

Make sure to read the documentation for each endpoint as some APIs are location specific, meaning that endpoints will only return information specific to the Location the API Device is associated with.

All API requests must be made over HTTPS. Requests made over plain HTTP will fail. API requests without authentication will also fail.

Epos Now APIs use Basic access authentication. When authenticating construct your key as follows - **Basic {{API_KEY}}**.
Basic.name: Authorization
